Now write your argumenative essay. Be sure to:
  • Introduce your topic.
  • Develop your explanation with logical reasoning and relevant evidence from the passages.
  • Group information and ideas from both passages logically.
  • Organize the reasons and evidence logically.
  • Use words, phrases, and clauses to connect your ideas and to clarify the relationships among claims, counterclaims reasons, and evidence.
  • Establish and maintain a formal style.
  • Provide a concluding statement or section that follows from the ideas presented.
